column1: '''Belegaer - Cercle d'etudes de Tolkien en Belgique''' was the [[Tolkien Societies
column2: Tolkien society]] of [[wikipedia:French Community of Belgium

column1: Belegaer was active in the 1980s and 1990s and published ''Cirth De Gandalf''. This society was dissolved after the death of its driving force, Nathalie Kotowski in 2001.<ref>http://www.jrrvf.com/forum/noncgi/Forum5/HTML/000292.html (accessed 03-12-2011)</ref>
